upload-zone.invalidFormatCantUseAnyFiles: We can't quite use any of the selected types of files. Could you try one of the following instead: {acceptedFilesText}
upload-zone.invalidFormatCantUseSomeFiles: We can't quite use some of the selected types of files. Could you try one of the following instead: {acceptedFilesText}
upload-zone.invalidFormatCantOneOfFiles: We can't quite use some of the selected types of files. Could you try one of the following instead: {acceptedFilesText}
upload-zone.invalidFormatCantSingleFile: We can't quite use that type of file. Could you try one of the following instead: {acceptedFilesText}?
upload-zone.invalidFileSize: We can't upload "{fileName}" because it's too large: we can only handle files of that type up to {formattedMaxSize}. Could you try a smaller file?

default-page.defaultTitle: Let's get your account set up!

emptyState.title: Execute your social strategy from one easy-to-manage campaign space.
emptyState.step1: Execute on your social strategy from one easy-to-manage campaign space.
emptyState.step3: Optimize performance with data insights in Analyze.
emptyState.imageTag: Example of campaign with multiple posts scheduled.

createCampaign.subtitle: Campaign Details
createCampaign.name: Name
createCampaign.notice1: Campaigns are visible to everyone in your organization,
createCampaign.notice2: however, team members will only see content for the social accounts that they have access to. You can

viewCampaign.subtext: Plan and schedule content across multiple social accounts all in one place. Get started by creating your posts for the campaign.

onboarding-page.title: Your account has been set up!
onboarding-page.description: Connect a social account, so you can schedule your first post
onboarding-page.testemonial: Publish helps us build a better model of content that generates more engagement.
onboarding-page.name: Justin Ozanich
onboarding-page.composerInput: What would you like to share?

story-preview.notePlaceholder: Add your caption or a note-to-self
story-preview.noteExplanation: When it comes time to post, you'll be able to copy and paste your note into Instagram.

stripe.noNameError: Uh oh, please fill out the cardholder name :)
stripe.noZipError: For extra security, please add the zip code associated with this card
stripe.invalidZipError: Whoops, looks like that zip code doesn't match what your bank has on record - up for trying again?

billing-upgrade-cta-banner.billedTrialEnd: You'll be billed {billedAmount} at the end of your trial.
billing-upgrade-cta-banner.completeBilling: Add your billing details now to start your subscription.

switch-plan-modal.proTrialistUpgradeHeader: Complete your trial and upgrade to the Pro Plan!
switch-plan-modal.proTrialistSubCopy: The Pro plan includes up to 8 social accounts, custom thumbnails for Instagram videos, Instagram first comment and more.
switch-plan-modal.proPlanMonthlyDescription: Cancel and get a refund any time
switch-plan-modal.freeConnect: Connect up to three social accounts
switch-plan-modal.freeSchedule: Schedule up to 10 posts per account

switch-plan-modal.proConnect: Connect up to eight social accounts including Pinterest
switch-plan-modal.proSchedule: Schedule up to 100 posts per account
switch-plan-modal.proCalendarView: Get a calendar view of your publishing schedule

welcome-modal.headline: We've refreshed the look of Buffer
welcome-modal.body1: We've tidied up the look of your Buffer dashboard!
welcome-modal.body2: We've kept all your posts and content just as it was but with a cleaner and faster experience.

welcome-b4b-trial-modal.subHeader: Get the most out of Buffer for Business with our getting started guide.
welcome-b4b-trial-modal.cta: Go to Our Getting Started Guide

step1.headline: A Better Buffer Experience
step1.body1: It's the same Buffer you’ve come to love – now simpler and faster, with
step1.body2: advanced Instagram features to help you grow your reach.

step2.headline: Turn Instagram Posts Into Sales
step2.body: Seamlessly transition your Instagram audience to your online store by linking your profile to a shoppable page, powered by your Instagram grid.
step2.altText: Instagram Grid Shop with custom URLs

step3.headline: Include a First Comment with Saved Hashtags
step3.body: Optimize your reach by including a first comment on Instagram posts. Insert custom saved hashtag groups with Hashtag Manager.

step4.headline: Switch Back at Any Time
step4.body: Feeling nostalgic? Switch back to classic Buffer at any time.
step4.altText: You can go back to classic Buffer from the top menu

instagram-first-comment-modal.headline: It looks like we’ll need permission to post an Instagram comment on your behalf.
instagram-first-comment-modal.postOnYourBehalf: You’ll need to allow Buffer to automatically post Instagram comments on your behalf.
instagram-first-comment-modal.canRequestMorePermission: We'll open up a window for you to grant us that permission now.
instagram-first-comment-modal.userNeedsLogoutSignin: To do this, {signout}, and log into the account which corresponds with {profileName}. Then we can open up a window for you to grant us that permission by clicking continue.
instagram-first-comment-modal.signout: please sign out of your facebook account
instagram-first-comment-modal.body: We’ll walk you through this now – It will just take a moment.

instagram-first-comment-pro-trial-modal.heading: Go Pro to include a first comment on scheduled Instagram posts.
instagram-first-comment-pro-trial-modal.heading2: Access all Pro features right now with a free 7-day trial.
instagram-first-comment-pro-trial-modal.body: Prefer to keep hashtags out of your Instagram captions? Save time by scheduling them as a first comment instead.
instagram-first-comment-pro-trial-modal.imageAlt: Publish your first comment directly to Instagram

proTrialFeatures.support: Access fast, helpful email and social media
proTrialFeatures.firstComment: Schedule first comments on Instagram posts
proTrialFeatures.integrations2: to connect with Zapier, IFTTT, Quuu, Pocket, Feedly, and more.

profiles-disconnected-modal.headline: We’ve lost access to some of your social accounts
profiles-disconnected-modal.body1: We’ve lost access to the following social accounts, in order for us to resume posting to these accounts you will need to reconnect them.
profiles-disconnected-modal.body2: Note: You’ll need to be logged in to the same account on the network to successfully reconnect your social account.

profiles-disconnected-banner.headline: Uh-oh, we've lost access to this account! Let's reconnect.
profiles-disconnected-banner.body: Please make sure that you're logged into this account on the same network, and we'll get you back in business in no time!

instagram-direct-posting-modal.headline: Would you like to set up Direct Scheduling for Instagram?
instagram-direct-posting-modal.description: Direct Scheduling allows you to post images and videos to Instagram directly from Buffer, just as you can with any other network.
instagram-direct-posting-modal.instructions: In order to set up Direct Scheduling you need to have an Instagram Business Profile. You can convert any account to a Business Profile through the Instagram mobile app.
instagram-direct-posting-modal.learnMore: You can find the Instagram set up guide here.
instagram-direct-posting-modal.dismiss: No thanks, I might do it later

steal-profile-modal.headline2: is already connected to another Buffer account.
steal-profile-modal.body1: Each social account can be tied to one Buffer account for security reasons. This Buffer account may be under a different email address that belongs to your organisation.
steal-profile-modal.body4: Buffer account, it needs to be removed from the other account first.
steal-profile-modal.notSureWhere: Not sure where your social account has been added already?

close-composer-confirmation-modal.text: Are you sure you want to close the composer? You will lose any unsaved changes.

plans-page.promoHeader: Get more with the new Buffer Publish
plans-page.promoDescription: For a limited time, upgrade to the Pro plan and keep your current pricing for 3 months.

story-group-queue.inputPlaceholder: What would you like to add to your Story?
story-group-queue.reminderText1: When it’s time to post your Story, we’ll send a
story-group-queue.mobileTagText: Uh-oh! Looks like you might not have the latest version of the Buffer mobile app. Download it now to start using Stories!
story-group-queue.bannerMobileTagText: Hmm...looks like you might not have the latest version of the Buffer mobile app. Download it now so that you can share this Story!

start.title: Get Started with Instagram Stories
start.step1Description: Due to Instagram limitations, Stories can't be directly scheduled. A Reminder is a notification from the Buffer Publish app.
start.step2Description: Storyboard your content and create draft captions. Then, choose the date and time you'd like to share with your audience.
start.step3Description: When your scheduled time arrives, Buffer will send you a Reminder. Preview on mobile, then tap to open in Instagram.
start.setReminders: Set Up Reminders to Get Started

user-tags.rightHeaderSubtext: Click anywhere on the photo to tag a public user.
user-tags.footerText: Instagram API limitations prevent searching for usernames and tagging private users.
